files.patch:
@@ -625,0 +625,16 @@
+    /**
+     * Returns a prefix mask,
+     * based on the true count of the mask.
+     *
+     * Assume {@code N} is the true count of the mask, the mask bit is
+     * set from the beginning lane till the lane numbered {@code N-1},
+     * otherwise it is unset.
+     *
+     * @return the prefix mask of this mask.
+     */
+    public final VectorMask<E> prefixMask() {
+        // Temporary implementation
+        AbstractSpecies<E> species = (AbstractSpecies<E>) vectorSpecies();
+        return species.iota().compare(VectorOperators.LT, trueCount());
+    }
+
